title: Dynamic text content type has no effect
description: The dynamic text element is not rendering content as expected based on the content types in the database field.
OB: The dynamic text element does not render the content as per the specified content types in the database field.
EB: I expect the dynamic text element to render the content from the database field based on the specified content types: 1) HTML text within <html ...</html tag, 2) HTML fragments not within <html tag, and 3) Text with RTF tags. It should appropriately display each type of content as intended.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Access the system with the database field containing the three types of content: HTML text within <html ...</html tag, HTML fragments not within <html tag, and Text with RTF tags.
2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field.
